thread.title: European stocks plunge on global economic concerns
thread.title_full: European stocks plunge on global economic concerns

title: European stocks plunge on global economic concerns
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Fri, Aug 21, 2015, 17:10 BST - UK Markets closed European stocks plunge on global economic concerns AFP – 16 minutes ago View Photo 

Europe's main stock markets ended the week sharply lower on Friday over growing concerns about global economic growth. 
London's benchmark FTSE 100 index sank 2.83 percent to close at 6,187.65 points. 
In the eurozone, the CAC 40 in Paris plunged 3.19 percent to end the day at 4,630.99 points, and Frankfurt's DAX 30 lost 2.95 percent to finish at 10,124.52 points (Other OTC: UBGXF - news ) .
